alert.note: Alert for Van Horn and Highway 54 Corridor (Texas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Midland-Odessa (Western Texas and Southeastern New Mexico)
info.headline: Freeze Warning issued November 04 at 11:55PM CDT until November 05 at 9:00AM CDT by NWS Midland-Odessa
info.description: ...FREEZE WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT FROM 4 AM TO 9 AM CDT SATURDAY... * WHAT...Sub-freezing temperatures as low as 31 degrees are expected. * WHERE...Van Horn and Highway 54 Corridor and Marfa Plateau. * WHEN...From 4 AM to 9 AM CDT Saturday. * IMPACTS...Frost and freeze conditions will kill crops, other sensitive vegetation and possibly damage unprotected outdoor plumbing.
info.instruction: Take steps now to protect tender plants from the cold. To prevent freezing and possible bursting of outdoor water pipes they should be wrapped, drained, or allowed to drip slowly. Those that have in-ground sprinkler systems should drain them and cover above- ground pipes to protect them from freezing.
